Text: O Jihofa, uwe̩ O̩jo̩ ki anache̩, uwe̩ O̩jo̩ ki anache̩, ta dufu!
Dʼo̩la-we̩ kwane̩, uwe̩ akajo̩ ane̩ ile̩-i;
Jihofa, gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ ame̩ne̩bibi,
Ma kekale̩ o̩la atʼe̩ne̩ le ma ka,
Ma nʼabo-we̩ aguche̩ mane̩, O Jihofa,
Ma kpa o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ kpai ilowa,
oñ ma kakini, Jihofa ali n;
Ame̩ ki dibetʼo̩, ame̩ ku me̩ nʼibe e̩la ef amone̩-i!
Owñ ki dʼeti gbe̩, agbʼo̩la n?
Owñ ki ako̩ abo uche̩ichi o̩la le̩, i adʼo̩la bi one̩ n?
Jihofa chema ibe ki dʼef one̩,
E̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ akʼo̩ o̩la, O Jihofa, gbede,
kʼe̩ dʼuñmi ñw u bʼiko e̩bie̩ne̩ te̩,
Todu Jihofa akʼabo-wñ rinyo̩ n;
todu ajo̩ eka adabi tef o̩kpakpa,
E̩ne̩ akwane̩ akobo̩ amachuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw mi taa?
I ma che Jihofa chʼateko mi n,
E̩gba kʼu kakini, E̩re̩-mi añwo̩ me̩,
Ef ejiji o̩wo̩wo̩ kʼu nada,
Ede uji adama kpai uwe̩,
Ma jʼalu ku ma kobo̩ onugo e̩no̩kpakpa,
Jihofa muda achʼo̩do̩go̩-mi kʼi gbo̩gba,
I la akʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-ma wa bʼuma oji ma
